customProperties.weaponEffects: Gains a +1 to damage rolls equal to half of your Charisma Bonus (rounded down, +2 CHA = +1 damage, +4 CHA = +2 damage, so on).

entries.name: Properties
entries: Armor Effects: Increases Charisma by 1, up to 30.
Weapon Effects: Gains a +1 to damage rolls equal to half of your Charisma Bonus (rounded down, +2 CHA = +1 damage, +4 CHA = +2 damage, so on).
